text: Francesco Maselli (9 December 1930 â€“ 21 March 2023), also known as Citto Maselli, was an Italian film director and screenwriter. He has directed 38 movies since 1949. His 1990 movie Il segreto was entered into the 40th Berlin International Film Festival. His other best known works include directing the movie Gli sbandati (1955) and for his acting role in The Name of the Rose (1986). Maselli was born in Rome. Maselli died in Rome on 21 March 2023, at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television directors Category:Actors from Rome Category:Writers from Rome
title: Francesco Maselli
